short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces all text on a page with lorem ipsum text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Right-click on any page and in the context menu, you will see a "Convert page to lorem" menu item. After clicking it, the extension will convert all text on the page to lorem ipsum text.

Note: no changes are permanent and will disappear after refreshing the page.
